text: Stephen John Greif (; 26 August 1944 â€“ 23 December 2022) was an English actor. He is known for his TV roles as Travis in Blake's 7 and Harry Fenning in three series of Citizen Smith. His movie credits include Casanova (2005) and Shoot on Sight (2007). Greif was born in Sawbridgeworth, Hertfordshire. Greif died on 23 December 2022, at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English television actors Category:Jewish British actors Category:Actors from Hertfordshire
title: Stephen Greif
